Label.en: Do you know the joke about the owl and the human who wears glasses?
Label.fr: Connais-tu la blague de la chouette et de l'humain à lunettes ?
Label.es: ¿Conoces el chiste del búho y el humano que lleva gafas?
Label.zh: Do you know the joke about the owl and the human who wears glasses?

Label.en: I kinda forgot how it goes...
Label.fr: J'ai un peu oublié comment elle fonctionne...
Label.zh: I kinda forgot how it goes...

Label.en: But you do wear glasses, right human?
Label.fr: Mais tu portes des lunettes, non ?
Label.zh: But you do wear glasses, right human?

Label.en: My cousin Alfred told me. He works in the Silicon Valley
Label.fr: Mon cousin Alfred me l'a dit. Il travaille dans la Silicon Valley
Label.es: Mi primo Alfred me lo dijo. Trabaja en el Silicon Valley
Label.zh: My cousin Alfred told me. He works in the Silicon Valley

Label.en: Never? That's weird... my cousin Alfred told me you did... and he works in the Silicon Valley
Label.fr: Jamais ? C'est étrange, mon cousin Alfred me dit que oui...il travaille dans la Silicon Valley
Label.es: ¿Nunca? Es extraño, mi primo Alfred me dice que sí... trabaja en Silicon Valley.
Label.zh: That's weird... my cousin Alfred told me you did... and he works in the Silicon Valley

Label.en: I thought those guys knew everything!
Label.fr: Je pensais que ces gars là savaient tout !
Label.es: ¡Pensé que esos tipos lo sabían todo!
Label.zh: I thought those guys knew everything!
